item.title: Getting started with Rustlang
item.description: In this Blog Post I go over getting started with Rustlang Rust is a systems programming language that runs blazingly fast, prevents segfaults, and guarantees thread safety. Installing Rust in Mac OS X / Linux To install Rust in Linux and Mac OS X run the following command: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh For other installation methods please read the following documentation Add the cargo binaries to your path by adding the following entry in ~/.
